p: The total phenolic and flavonoid content of CTR, CTS, CTL, and CTF extracts was determined using the Folinâ€“Ciocalteu and aluminum chloride colorimetric methods, as described previously [ 21]. The total phenolic and flavonoid content was expressed as gallic acid equivalent (GAE) per g and quercetin equivalent (OE) per g of CTR, CTS, CTL, and CTF extracts.
